page.title: 18RESIDENTS ASSOCIATION
page.content: The Carpenders Park Residents Association works for the benefit of this community.Through their elected committee they try to improve the quality of life and act as a pressure group.Recently they have been concerned with the provision of a community hall.Land and money are now both available and residents have been invited to express their opinion.They have also formed a neighbourhood watch scheme to help combat the high burglary rate.A newsletter is published quarterly and delivered by volunteers.The children in our class think there should be more areas to play with "NO DOGS ALLOWED" and that insufficient attention was paid to the needs of the younger generation when the estate was planned.
